description: Ben Snell is a software developer and designer specialized in creative applications of advanced technologies, including machine learning and robotics. Ben graduated from Carnegie Mellon University in 2017 with University Honors after defining his own major, Experiential Art and Design. Most recently, he was an Innovator in Residence at Autodesk's Pier 9 fabrication research center. He lives and works in New York City. For work experience, see LinkedIn. For code samples, see Github. . . . Website designed + programmed from scratch.
